title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: iStock

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: Lovehoney's massive 70%-off fire sale, get 12 months of eBay Plus for $1, up to 90% off everything at Catch and more!

1. 70% off at Lovehoney: Lovehoney is having a big spring clearacne sale with up to 70% off toys, lingerie, bondage gear and more. (And yes, there are plenty of options for hetero blokes, in case you were wondering.) Click here!

2. $1 eBay Plus Memberships: eBay is running a targeted promotion to boost eBay Plus signups. For a limited time, you can get 12 months of its premium membership for $1, which is $48 off. Click here to learn more.

3. 90% off at Catch: Catch is having 13th birthday sale with a huge 50-90% off everything! Click here to see the deals.

4. $170 off Oral B Smart7 toothbrush: Oral B's top-of-the-range Smart7 electric toothbrush has been slashed by over 65% on eBay. Normally costing $269, it's now down to just $96. To get the full discount, use the code 'POTTER' at checkout. Click here!

5. Cheap games and movies: Amazon Australia is having a sale on video games, DVDs and Blu-rays with up to 60% off select titles. Prices start at just $3.50! Click here.

6. Cheap S10e with free Galaxy Buds: Optus has knocked its Samsung Galaxy S10e 30GB plan down to $59 a month. (For comparison, Optus was previously selling the S10e for $75 per month with just with 4GB of data.) If you sign-up to the plan before November 25, you also get a free pair of Galaxy Buds valued at $249. Bargain! Here are the inclusions:

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: Lovehoney's massive 70%-off fire sale, get 12 months of eBay Plus for $1, up to 90% off everything at Catch and more!...
